meanings.definition: Inner parts or workings of something
meanings.sent1: The watchmaker carefully examined the internals of the clock to fix the gears.
meanings.sent2: It is important to understand the internals of a computer to troubleshoot any issues.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a hidden message in the internals of the old journal.
meanings.sent4: The teacher explained the internals of a plant as if it were a complex machine.
meanings.sent5: The magician revealed the internals of his magic trick to the amazed audience.

meanings.sent1: Doctors study the internals of the human body to learn about different organs.
meanings.sent2: A healthy diet is essential for maintaining the internals of your body.
meanings.sent3: The chef compared the ingredients to the internals of a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent4: The athlete pushed his internals to the limit during the intense workout.
meanings.sent5: The biologist examined the internals of the frog under the microscope.
